channel.title: Do you not have the levels, items, etc. to PK on Real RuneScape 07? Try Taverly!
channel.description:
[center]Webiste: http://taverly.org Downloadable Client: http://taverly.org/Client/Taverly.jar Webclient: http://taverly.org/webclient.php[/center]
[center][img]http://taverly.org/images/Taverly/logo.png[/img][/center]
Do you not have the levels, items, or money to PK on Real RuneScape 07? Or maybe you do but you need practice and to have a little fun? Well Taverly is the place for you, we provide you with all 07 has to offer in real RuneScape and more! Our team created this server for the exact reason, that no one has the time, levels, items, or money to PK in real RuneScape. They should come here in their time, if you don't play 07 RuneScape you can still come and join Taverly for a load for fun! We provide you with spawning meaning you get your items by just typing a code! Also we provide PK points for items we do not allow to be spawned.[/CENTER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sXcDkqn.png[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER][I]We are brand new for the most part, but we had a bit of 'testing' I guess you could call it go on for the past week just to get rid of any obvious bugs, gather suggestions or ideas for making the server a little more efficient for the players before launch.[/I][/CENTER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/d8wwOcl.png[/img][/CENTER]
[I][CENTER]We're constantly updating the most bugs we can find daily, we have a "Feedback and Suggestions" category for all of you to post in.[/CENTER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2Do42uE.png[/img][/CENTER]
[I][CENTER]We provide you with a fully working website! Do not like downloading client's? We got you covered! We have a fully finished webclient, or maybe you don't like using webclients incase there is a virus!? We also have you covered there with a downloadable client for your needs.[/CENTER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/T28ci9q.png[/img][/CENTER]
Features: [*] Good combat system. [*] 100% Switching [*] Hyperion Core [*] Cheat Client Patched [*] Toggle on and off New hp bars/fading/x10 [*] Clan chats [*] 100% Mage bank + Near by areas features coded. [*] Pk Point shop [*] Quest tab pk information. [*] Titles [*] Correct food & Pot System [*] Everything needed for a pk server. [I][B]And more, join to find out![/B][/I]
[I][CENTER]That is the most I can say for now, want to know it all? Join and find out! :)[/CENTER]
[I]Credits: [U][URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/orel/"]Orel[/URL] - For source [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/anth0ny/"]Taverly/Anth0ny[/URL] - Creator of server, host, website, and more obviously. [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/murilirum/"]Murilirum[/URL] - Thread format [/U]

item.title: Do you not have the levels, items, etc. to PK on Real RuneScape 07? Try Taverly!
item.dc:creator: @Bhpk Bhpk
item.description:
@Bhpk wrote:

Please need the source/client/cache, please send me on pm or post it here, i really like this server.

Pleasem Thanks. And if you won’t post the source and client and cache link at least make it online.

Read full topic

item.title: Do you not have the levels, items, etc. to PK on Real RuneScape 07? Try Taverly!
item.dc:creator: @Taverly Taverly
item.description:
@Taverly wrote:

[center]Webiste: http://taverly.org
Downloadable Client: http://taverly.org/Client/Taverly.jar
Webclient: http://taverly.org/webclient.php[/center]

[center][/center]

Do you not have the levels, items, or money to PK on Real RuneScape 07? Or maybe you do but you need practice and to have a little fun? Well Taverly is the place for you, we provide you with all 07 has to offer in real RuneScape and more! Our team created this server for the exact reason, that no one has the time, levels, items, or money to PK in real RuneScape. They should come here in their time, if you don’t play 07 RuneScape you can still come and join Taverly for a load for fun! We provide you with spawning meaning you get your items by just typing a code! Also we provide PK points for items we do not allow to be spawned.[/CENTER]

[CENTER]

sXcDkqn.png761×500
[/CENTER]

[CENTER]We are brand new for the most part, but we had a bit of ‘testing’ I guess you could call it go on for the past week just to get rid of any obvious bugs, gather suggestions or ideas for making the server a little more efficient for the players before launch.[/CENTER]

[CENTER][/CENTER]

[I][CENTER]We’re constantly updating the most bugs we can find daily, we have a “Feedback and Suggestions” category for all of you to post in.[/CENTER]

[CENTER][/CENTER]

[I][CENTER]We provide you with a fully working website! Do not like downloading client’s? We got you covered! We have a fully finished webclient, or maybe you don’t like using webclients incase there is a virus!? We also have you covered there with a downloadable client for your needs.[/CENTER]

[CENTER]

T28ci9q.png761×497
[/CENTER]

Features:
[] Good combat system.
[] 100% Switching
[] Hyperion Core
[] Cheat Client Patched
[] Toggle on and off New hp bars/fading/x10
[] Clan chats
[] 100% Mage bank + Near by areas features coded.
[] Pk Point shop
[] Quest tab pk information.
[] Titles
[] Correct food & Pot System
[] Everything needed for a pk server.
And more, join to find out!

[I][CENTER]That is the most I can say for now, want to know it all? Join and find out! :)[/CENTER]

[I]Credits:
Orel - For source
Taverly/Anth0ny - Creator of server, host, website, and more obviously.
Murilirum - Thread format
